title: Point of No Return (1993)Bridget Fonda+Gabriel Byrne(MULTISUBS)
description:
Point of No Return (1993) Bridget Fonda + Gabriel Byrne (MULTISUBS) 

aka The Assassin (1993)
Kodenavn Nina (1993) Kodnamn Nina (1993) Code Name Nina (1993) Codename Nina (1993)
 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0107843/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0107843/</a>

With Dermot Mulroney, Harvey Keitel and Anne Bancroft

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files:
Danish, English, Finnish, German, French, Italian, Norwegian, Polish, Portugese, Spanish, Swedish. (Sorry, Dutch friends, your language was not on the DVD.)

A young woman is forced to become a secret killer for the government. American remake of Luc Besson's 'Nikita' - in my opinion better than the original. The actors are more interesting, effects are better, and we actually see the hotel blow up.

Widescreen, DVDrip XviD 2-pass 720x288, really good stereo.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.

This is a new and improved rip of the torrent I uploaded February 11, 2008. Since then, my ripping procedures have improved so much that I can offer much better quality with the same filesize, and lots of subtitles. The old torrent has been so popular that I thought it deserves an improved replacement. The old rip was 576x320 pixels with no subs.
